title: WHAT THE HECK IS WRONG! @RIOT SOMEONE REPLY AND HELP ME PLEASE!
body: Why haven't i got my rewards, i wasnt banned or anything this season? I dont get it, I tried so hard to get gold and I get no rewards?

replies.body: Yeah, I made a ticket 2 hours ago like bruh..

We're still getting ranked rewards out and are aiming to have them out by the end of the month. Give us some time and we'll get them out to you, bud. :)

Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=GcyZT8AL,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-11-11T04:37:15.744+0000)
>
> We're still getting ranked rewards out and are aiming to have them out by the end of the month. Give us some time and we'll get them out to you, bud. :)
> 
> Let me know if you have any questions.

Can you read my Prev. comment and answer those questions? Or do you not have any answers? haha

None of the matches you play in Flex Queue will result in any sort of ranked reward. You're playing in the preseason for 2017, so it's simply a practice period before the next season officially starts.

Hope that clears this up.
you will get a special reward not announced by Riot for getting Gold (or higher) in both Queues. But you will get the border and icon just for the highest of them both, I am pretty sure about that

Thanks =) I like you and dArt, So myself as a summoner, will get these or do I have some kind of ban? I dont remember, But I dont think i do, another question : if i do this flex que and get higher in flex then i do in solo/duo do i get both rewards? says im gold 5 in solo/duo and get gold 4 do i get 2 gold icons?
Me too, I submitted a ticket as no one has replied to me. I definitely didn't get banned, especially when I wasn't active on this game until a few weeks ago just to get rewards.
